title: The Chakra Diaries
description: Balance your own chakras as you learn how these "energy centers" affect love and loss, health and happiness, life and death for the participants in a chakra workshop. You'll laugh, cry and maybe even jump for joy as you experience their transformation! Whether you're an avid yogi or yogini or have never heard of chakras, you'll find this look at the human condition and the miracles that can happen through forgiveness, love and energy healing to be both enlightening and entertaining.Chakra balancing techniques and wisdom are woven throughout the life stories.
author: Becca Chopra
